XXLChess

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • XXLChess.Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CPU, Human

    public abstract class Player
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String player_colour)
      Constructor for a player, if player's colour pieces is white then the player makes the first move Last piece is set to null (no move has been made)
